member.name: T:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Core.Web.ConfigureSwaggerOptions
member.remarks: This allows API versioning to define a Swagger document per API version after the service has been resolved from the service container.

member.name: T:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Core.Web.SwaggerDefaultValues
member.summary: Represents the Swagger/Swashbuckle operation filter used to document the implicit API version parameter.
member.remarks: This is only required due to bugs in the . Once they are fixed and published, this class can be removed.
